subject: ☄️ BNB Hits All-Time High
body: View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/1ad7b68c-27ef-4b48-a740-6a9f918f2e60/Frame_26.png) Caption: “🧠** Today’s DYOR:** **•** BNB hits all-time high, triggering $180M in crypto liquidations **• **Coinbase rebrands its wallet to Base, a new super app **• **OG investor sells 80,000 BTC for $9B **• **The bull case for [$PUMP](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/pump-fun/) Let’s dive in.“ — ——————————————————————————— ## 📈 Market Indicator View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/b0075a1d-1d43-4000-9728-2831dd5548d9/market_indicator.png?t=1753696414) Follow image link: (https://www.coingecko.com/) Caption: ——————————————————————————— ## 👀 Trending View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/1cc1ebec-7e5a-4705-9ab3-222d9d346b7a/img.png?t=1753696428) Follow image link: (https://beincrypto.com/bnb-all-time-high-crypto-liquidations/) Caption: #### ☄️ BNB hits all-time high, triggers $180 million in crypto liquidations BNB surged to a new all-time high, propelling its market capitalization to $114 billion and triggering nearly $180 million in liquidations. The rally was driven by strong BNB Chain activity, rising institutional treasury demand, and widespread bullish sentiment. Daily trading volume soared above $5 billion, underscoring robust market conviction. [[Read more]](https://beincrypto.com/bnb-all-time-high-crypto-liquidations/) ——————————————————————————— View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/c59df3a6-4515-431a-8862-23171f6b0dc3/img-1.png?t=1753696457) Follow image link: (https://www.theblock.co/post/362713/coinbase-unveils-base-app-rebrands-wallet-as-all-in-one-social-and-trading-platform) Caption: #### 📱 Coinbase rebrands its wallet to Base, a new social media super app Coinbase has rebranded its wallet as Base App, an all-in-one platform combining social networking, trading, mini-apps, and instant USDC payments on its Ethereum Layer 2 Base ecosystem. Base App features a social feed, real-time token trading, mini-apps, messaging, and smart wallets compatible across apps and chains. The goal is to make on-chain activity as seamless as any mainstream application. [[Read more]](https://www.theblock.co/post/362713/coinbase-unveils-base-app-rebrands-wallet-as-all-in-one-social-and-trading-platform) ——————————————————————————— View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/d2dbab83-1ff5-4901-9a5f-7086503480ab/img-2.png?t=1753696547) Follow image link: (https://cointelegraph.com/news/early-bitcoin-investor-sells-80000-btc-galaxy-digital) Caption: #### 💰 Satoshi-era Bitcoin investor cashes out 80,000 BTC for $9B via Galaxy Digital An early Bitcoin investor sold 80,000 BTC—worth over $9 billion—through Galaxy Digital, ranking as one of the largest crypto transactions in history and intensifying market volatility. The sale was part of the investor’s estate planning strategy, with Galaxy executing multiple block trades and transferring much of the BTC directly to exchanges. Despite the scale, the market absorbed the move with only a modest, short-term decline before Bitcoin prices rebounded. [[Read more]](https://cointelegraph.com/news/early-bitcoin-investor-sells-80000-btc-galaxy-digital) ——————————————————————————— ### ✉️ A Message From Delve: ### Time to change compliance forever. 🌍 Industry News * US **spot Ethereum ETFs** log second-biggest week with $1.85 billion in net inflow [[Read more]](https://www.theblock.co/post/364357/spot-ethereum-etfs-post-second-biggest-week-inflows) * **Metaplanet** adds 780 BTC for $92.5 million, now holds bitcoin worth $2 billion [[Read more]](https://www.theblock.co/post/364339/metaplanet-adds-bitcoin) * Hong Kong’s **OSL Group** secures $300 million in equity funding to fuel global expansion [[Read more]](https://www.theblock.co/post/364241/osl-group-secures-300-million-equity-funding) * **Vietnam** deploys national blockchain for identity and records [[Read more]](https://cointelegraph.com/news/vietnam-ndachain-national-blockchain-launch-2025) * **NFT market cap** surged to $6.6B in July, according to DappRadar [ [Read more]](https://cointelegraph.com/news/nft-market-cap-6b-cryptopunks-surge) ## 🚀 Projects * **Dragonfly** exec says US government is considering charges against the venture firm for its early support of Tornado Cash [[Read more]](https://www.theblock.co/post/364330/dragonfly-exec-says-us-government-is-considering-charges-against-the-venture-firm-for-its-early-support-of-tornado-cash) * **EigenLayer **introduces multi-chain verification on Base, enabling AVSs to expand beyond Ethereum L1 [[Read more]](https://www.theblock.co/post/364250/eigenlayer-multi-chain-verification) * Elon Musk’s **Grok AI** integrates with **Kalshi**, Paradigm-backed prediction market [[Read more]](https://www.theblock.co/post/364217/elon-musk-grok-kalshi) * **Pudgy Penguins** denies OpenSea acquisition rumors, focuses on partnerships [[Read more]](https://cointelegraph.com/news/pudgy-penguins-denies-opensea-acquisition-rumors) * **Anchorage Digital** announces stablecoin issuance platform on GENIUS’ heels [[Read more]](https://cointelegraph.com/news/anchorage-digital-stablecoin-platform-genius-signing) ## 🔥 Trending Tokens * **[$ETH](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/ethereum/)**** (+3%):** SharpLink Gaming buys $295 million in ETH, pushing total holdings over 438,000 ETH [[Read more]](https://www.theblock.co/post/364343/sharplink-gaming-buys-295-million-worth-ethereum) * **[$BNB](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/bnb/)**** (+12%):** Windtree secures over $500M equity line of credit to build BNB treasury, taps Kraken for custody [[Read more]](https://www.theblock.co/post/364279/windtree-secures-over-500m-equity-line-of-credit-to-build-bnb-treasury-taps-kraken-for-custody) * **[$VINE](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/vine-coin/)**** (+265%):** VINE surges 400% in July as whale activity and Elon Musk's AI-driven Vine revival tease fueled market momentum [[Read more]](https://beincrypto.com/whales-accumulate-vine-holders-100000/) ^*** **^^% increase shown are changes over the past week^ ## 🌙 Daily Pick [$PUMP:](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/pump-fun/) $PUMP is a memecoin linked to the [Pump.fun](https://Pump.fun) trading platform in the Solana ecosystem, influenced by sector trends, platform adoption, and active buyback efforts. **X: **[@pumpdotfun](https://x.com/pumpdotfun) **CA: **[pumpCmXqMfrsAkQ5r49WcJnRayYRqmXz6ae8H7H9Dfn](http://pumpcmxqmfrsakq5r49wcjnrayyrqmxz6ae8h7h9dfn) **Current Price: **$0.004862 **FDV: **$4.87B ==Bullish Outlook:== $PUMP’s bull case centers on its 30-day trading incentive program, which could boost volume and spark a technical breakout if $0.0033 resistance is cleared—potentially driving an 80%+ rally from current levels. Despite strong competition from [LetsBONK.fun](https://LetsBONK.fun) and dilution risks, $PUMP’s oversold technicals and sector-wide Solana memecoin momentum give bulls hope for a rebound if platform relevance and rewards are managed well. Key to upside: breaking $0.0033 and regaining market share. ^*****^^_Disclaimer: This content is for informational purposes only and should not be considered financial advice; always do your own research before making any investment decisions._^ View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/42bac0be-f091-4b4b-a95d-c250412a1700/Screenshot_2025-07-28_at_5.58.24_PM.png?t=1753696734) Caption: ——————————————————————————— Share RAREMINTS You currently have 0 referrals, only 1 away from receiving [Guide] Five Secret Tools to 10x Your Crypto Investment.
